title: Gerrymandered districts favor one political party

content.question: Which of the following is generally true of the gerrymandering of congressional districts?

choices.label: It results in more Democrats being elected to the House.
It results in more Republicans being elected to the House.
It guarantees that all minority parties will be equally represented.
It creates districts that favor one political party over another.
It violates the principle of one-person, one-vote.

content.answer: It creates districts that favor one political party over another.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
